query.value: SELECT * FROM tas:folder
SELECT * FROM tas:document
SELECT * FROM tas:folder WHERE IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[siteId]')
SELECT * FROM tas:document WHERE IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[siteId]')
SELECT * FROM tas:document WHERE IN_TREE('NODE_REF[siteId]')
SELECT * FROM cmis:document WHERE cmis:objectTypeId = 'D:tas:document'
SELECT * FROM cmis:document WHERE cmis:objectTypeId <> 'D:tas:document' AND cmis:name LIKE 'standard%'
SELECT * FROM cmis:document WHERE cmis:objectTypeId IN ('D:tas:document') AND cmis:name LIKE 'tas%'
SELECT * FROM cmis:document WHERE cmis:objectTypeId NOT IN ('D:tas:document') AND cmis:name LIKE 'standard%'
SELECT * FROM tas:document WHERE cmis:name LIKE 'tas%'
SELECT * FROM tas:document WHERE cmis:name LIKE 'standard%'
SELECT * FROM tas:document WHERE cmis:name IN('tas-file1.txt', 'tas-sub-file1.txt', 'standard-file2.doc')
SELECT * FROM tas:document WHERE cmis:name LIKE 'tas%' AND tas:TextPropertyC='text sub-file-3'
SELECT * FROM tas:document WHERE cmis:name NOT IN('tas-file1.txt', 'tas-sub-file1.txt', 'standard-file2.doc')
SELECT * FROM tas:document WHERE cmis:baseTypeId = 'cmis:document' AND tas:TextPropertyC LIKE 'text sub%'
SELECT * FROM tas:document WHERE cmis:baseTypeId <> 'cmis:document' AND tas:TextPropertyC LIKE 'text sub%'
SELECT * FROM tas:document WHERE cmis:baseTypeId IN ('cmis:document') AND tas:TextPropertyC LIKE 'text sub%'
SELECT * FROM tas:document WHERE cmis:baseTypeId NOT IN ('cmis:document') AND tas:TextPropertyC LIKE 'text sub%'
SELECT * FROM tas:document WHERE cmis:objectId = 'NODE_REF[d1]'
SELECT * FROM tas:document WHERE cmis:objectId IN ('NODE_REF[d1]', 'NODE_REF[d2]')
SELECT * FROM tas:document WHERE cmis:objectId NOT IN ('NODE_REF[d1]', 'NODE_REF[d2]')
SELECT * FROM cmis:folder WHERE cmis:objectTypeId = 'F:tas:folder'
SELECT * FROM cmis:folder WHERE cmis:objectTypeId <> 'F:tas:folder' AND cmis:name LIKE 'standard%'
SELECT * FROM cmis:folder WHERE cmis:objectTypeId IN ('F:tas:folder') AND cmis:name LIKE 'tas%'
SELECT * FROM cmis:folder WHERE cmis:objectTypeId NOT IN ('F:tas:folder') AND cmis:name LIKE 'standard%'
SELECT * FROM tas:folder WHERE cmis:name LIKE 'tas%' AND tas:TextPropertyF = 'text sub-folder-1'
SELECT * FROM tas:folder WHERE cmis:name LIKE 'standard%'
SELECT * FROM tas:folder WHERE cmis:name IN('tas-sub-folder1', 'tas-folder2', 'standard-folder3') ORDER BY cmis:name ASC
SELECT * FROM tas:folder WHERE cmis:objectId = 'NODE_REF[f1]'
SELECT * FROM tas:folder WHERE cmis:objectId IN ('NODE_REF[f1]', 'NODE_REF[f1-1]')
SELECT * FROM tas:folder WHERE cmis:objectId NOT IN ('NODE_REF[f1]', 'NODE_REF[f1-1]')
SELECT * FROM tas:folder WHERE cmis:parentId = 'NODE_REF[f1]' ORDER BY cmis:name DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:folder WHERE cmis:parentId <> 'NODE_REF[f1]' ORDER BY cmis:name DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:folder WHERE cmis:parentId IN('NODE_REF[f1]', 'NODE_REF[f1-1]') ORDER BY cmis:name ASC
SELECT * FROM tas:folder WHERE cmis:parentId NOT IN('NODE_REF[f1]', 'NODE_REF[f1-1]') ORDER BY cmis:name ASC
SELECT * FROM tas:folder WHERE cmis:baseTypeId='cmis:folder' ORDER BY cmis:createdBy DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:folder WHERE cmis:baseTypeId <> 'cmis:folder' ORDER BY cmis:createdBy ASC
SELECT * FROM tas:folder WHERE cmis:baseTypeId IN('cmis:folder') AND cmis:objectId='NODE_REF[f1]' ORDER BY cmis:creationDate DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:folder WHERE cmis:baseTypeId NOT IN('cmis:folder') ORDER BY cmis:creationDate ASC
SELECT * FROM tas:folder WHERE IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]')
SELECT * FROM cmis:folder WHERE IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]')
SELECT * FROM tas:folder WHERE cmis:objectId IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM tas:folder WHERE cmis:objectId IS NULL
SELECT * FROM tas:document WHERE cmis:objectId IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM tas:document WHERE cmis:objectId IS NULL
